edu.rit.crst

Class Gray

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.crst.Generator
      • edu.rit.crst.Gray

  • public class Gray
extends Generator
    Class Gray provides an object that generates input values for a cryptographic Function.

    Class Gray generates N cryptographic function input values, where N is a constructor argument. The input values are the Gray code sequence 0, 1, 3, 2, 6, 7, 5, 4, . . . ; each input differs from its predecessor in one bit position.

    Feeding the Gray generator into the Xor generator results in a sequence of input values that starts at an initial value and proceeds from there in a Gray code sequence.
